ygData.messageBody:
run out of stamina your stats start to drop, which in turn lowers your attack and AC

>>> David Rogers <derogers334@...> 5.26.99 10:16:18 AM >>>
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>

--- Olgar <olgar@...> wrote:
> I have noticed now that I have dual wield and double
> attack that fights seem to wear me out more. My
> question is that what happens when yer little yellow
> bars runs out during a fight, can you no longer kick
> and double attack?

I don't know what happens if you run your Stamina out,
but if does, have your Cleric or Paladin cast Invigor
on you (replenishes Stamina). And consider getting
items that add to your Stamina attribute, lightening
your load, or trying to shorten your fights.
